title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Qualitative Analysis-Based Scientific Simulation for Technology-Enhanced Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can observe and analyze scientific phenomena using VR simulations in technology-enhanced learning environments
Learners evaluate technology utilization strategies and propose improvements by applying qualitative content analysis techniques
Learners can compare and explain cases of sustaining innovation (gradual improvement of existing technologies) and disruptive innovation through team projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
